name: 隱藏痞客幫廣告(Pixnet No ADs)
description:
隱藏痞客邦廣告, 你只需要點擊 [ Install with Stylish ]
To hide pixnet_ads, all you need to do is click on [ Install with Stylish ]

使用需求: Firefox 瀏覽器, Stylish 附加元件
Requirement: Firefox, Stylish

discussions.name: Extra selectors and block the "selection" protection（擋下額外 2 個區塊，並解除選取／反白保護）
